name: Becca
description:
Please enjoy my mini-adventure with Becca the bunny! It'll probably only take you around 40 minutes to experience it, but I hope you feel the care and love I put into all the hand-drawn art and original music for this cozy, point-and-click story.

Story

Becca has moved to a new town and is attending a new school. On her first day, Becca is having trouble fitting in but learns that her new school is having an art contest. Since Becca loves to draw she decides to enter the contest by joining the school’s art club. When she arrives all she wants to paint are her feelings for Sora. There is only 1 month until the contest ends but Becca's growing anxiety about her missing pet and life at a new school are making things hard for her.

In this interactive story you follow Becca's daily routine for a few days and get a peek into some of her inner thoughts. Let's help Becca move forward through the first month at her new school - and find new happiness. Good luck, Becca!

Game Details:

  • Charming point-and-click interactive mini-story you can enjoy in about 40 minutes
  • 5 main chapters split up over different days
  • Several mini-games in different scenes with simple controls (clicking, drag and drop, tapping, etc.)
  • Extra scenes available after finishing the main story
  • Don't forget to collect all the keys to see Becca's Memory Album
  • All art and background music are original by Slimomo
